title: Affordable Luxury: 4-Bedroom Home You Don‚Äôt Want to Miss!
description:
St. Francis Hills is a newly developed subdivision nestled in the serene hills of Consolacion, Cebu. Surrounded by natural landscapes, it offers a peaceful and harmonious community where neighbors live in quiet simplicity and comfort. This gated subdivision enjoys a unique geographical advantage, ideally situated between Consolacion and Talamban. It offers easy access to key establishments such as SM Consolacion, Sacred Heart School ‚Äì Ateneo de Cebu, the University of San Carlos, and North General Hospital.

Originally priced at ‚Ç±7.9 million, now available for only ‚Ç±6.5 million ‚Äî a rare opportunity you won't want to miss!
